text.author: Herbert George Wells
text.title: The Time Machine
text.summary: The protagonist travels to the future using a time machine and arrives on an Earth with thin air, now tidally locked to face the sun, where, on a sloping beach next to rocks covered in vegetation, he sees a huge white butterfly and a monstrous crab-like creature.
